item.title: Omnitron Sensors’ MEMS could rid us of the spinning tops on self-driving cars (and lower costs too)
item.description: Omnitron Sensors, which makes MEMS sensor chips, has raised $13 million to create inexpensive sensors for self-driving cars.

item.title: DeepSeek helps speed up threat detection while raising national security concerns
item.description: DeepSeek and its R1 model aren't wasting any time rewriting the rules of cybersecurity AI in real-time. Enterprises can't ignore this risk.

item.title: Dario Amodei challenges DeepSeek’s $6 million AI narrative: What Anthropic thinks about China’s latest AI move
item.description: Amodei says the breakthrough actually cost billions, emphasizing that AI development remains resource-intensive despite engineering gains.

item.title: Pig API: Give your AI agents a virtual desktop to automate Windows apps
item.description: How PigAPI enables AI agents to interact directly with graphical user interfaces (GUIs) within virtual Windows desktops hosted in the cloud.

item.title: U.S. Copyright Office says AI generated content can be copyrighted — if a human contributes to or edits it
item.description: AI filmmakers and creatives applauded the move — welcoming the opportunity to receive copyright protections on their work.
